main.name: Patrick's { Portfolio }
main.description: I am a web developer who is passionate about programming and language
main.bio: I am a lifelong learner with an insatiable curiosity and a love for learning! I have recently settled down in Denver, Colorado where I work as a full stack developer for York Solutions. Outside of work, I am an avid rock climber, mountain biker, musician and writer. I love to travel, and I enjoy reading crunchy technical literature while on the move. One day, I hope to write my own interpreter, but for now, building robust and sophisticated web applicaitons is keeping me busy!

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Business Marketing
education.description: Contributing member of Montana States' American Marketing Association (AMA) chapter.

work.title: Software Development Constultant
work.description: Developed by York Solutions, Barriers to Entry is a comprehensive, intense program created to prepare people to move into entry level software development roles. This interactive training covers Java, Full Stack, soft skills, methodologies, concepts, principles, & practices.

work.title: Email Marketing Specialist
work.description: Built emails using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for multi-channel email marketing campaigns.

projects.title: Budget App
projects.category: Budget app used to track accounts, budgets, and transactions

projects.title: Retail Store
projects.category: App built collaborating with 9 other developers
